climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: MADE IN THE USA WITH LOVE AND YOUR RECYCLING. These toothbrushes are proudly made from recycled materials right here in the USA.
SET INCLUDES SIX TOOTHBRUSHES. Handle made from 100% recycled #5 plastics.
TIERED BRISTLES FOR GENTLE, THOROUGH CLEANING. Made from new nylon.
UNIQUE CURVED HANDLE. Preserve toothbrushes boast a unique, gently curved handle. The handle was developed with dental professionals for an effective and thorough cleaning.
BPA-FREE AND RECYCLABLE THROUGH PRESERVE’S TAKEBACK PROGRAM. Preserve products are never tested on animals. Period.
SET IS ASSORTED COLORS (colors may vary). SET IS ASSORTED COLORS (colors may vary). Each toothbrush comes in a lightweight pouch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a Great Idea
reviews.reviewText: My dentist wanted me to switch to a softer toothbrush and the Preserve is ideal as it is not only incredibly soft and effective, but it gives me a recyclable option versus having to toss it into the landfill. I like how the handle is curved which is ergonomically better than my old toothbrush as it naturally gets around the top of my teeth and better aligns with the shape of my gums.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These toothbrushes are just great. Easy to hold, super soft bristles and the angle is perfect for contact with the teeth. Plus they are recycled and this is great for all of us on Earth 1.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will never buy another!
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying I have texture issues. I have tried various brands of all types of materials and each and every one of them just .... gave me goosebumps so to speak (warned you about my texture issue). These are not large or small, and absolutely perfectly smooth! From handle to the head of the brush itself, super smooth. The head of the brush isn't too large causing one to gag or even feel like it is too big for your mouth or anything. I was skeptical of the odd arch/shape of this brush, it is strange. However, it is so oddly perfect once you hold it in your hand. I never would have thought to buy such a brush, but once you use it, you will understand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice thin compact head
reviews.reviewText: I love the thin compact flat top head. Also like the long slightly bend handle. I find it easy to brush the back of my teeth. It is firm, but not extra firm, so it's good for sensitive teeth. This brush is my new favorite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great price, Almost great product
reviews.reviewText: I love these toothbrushes. I’ve used them for years. I love the price, that they are recyclable and that they are simple. I don’t need a hunch of bells and whistles for my toothbrush.One thing that I don’t like is the shape of the handle. I think it’s curved in order to be ergonomic. I can’t speak to that part but I can speak to how annoying it is when I set the toothbrush down on a counter. It almost always rolls to one side and the bristles touch tue countertop. GROSS.Other than this one design flaw, these toothbrushes are great. I’ll still buy and use them. I just have to be super careful when I set tue toothbrush down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best ever - from a guy with 55,000 brushings - plus info about three month replacement rule
reviews.reviewText: I'm 80 years old, have most of my teeth, and have used a LOT of tooth brushes. I estimate that I have brushed my teeth with a toothbrush about 55,000 times. This brush is the best I have ever had. The brushes last and the genuine ergonomic design of the handle and angle of the brushes make the toothbrush very easy to use correctly -brushing the inside and outside tooth surfaces vertically instead of across. Since they last so long ( see the next paragraph about this), and proper dental care prolongs life, I bought 30 of them - enough to last the rest of my life. I discovered these brushes in our grocery store and bought them from Amazon because of the limited quantity. Now the store no longer carries them, which proves the rule that all good products will eventually be taken off the market or made worse by the manufacturer. So, buy a bunch of these because the price is right, they are fabulous brushes, and it appears that are getting harder to find. Later added: The first brush is still going strong. The bristles keep their shape and stiffness (soft), and the ergonomic design continues to be extremely helpful.About the generic three month replacement recommendation for all toothbrushes. Thanks for all of the responses to my question. I have since researched it. The CDC cites only one study about this issue. The study found that there was no evidence of bacterial buildup in toothbrushes after three-four months of use, especially if they are washed in hot water after each use and stored upright in the open air. The only reason to replace a toothbrush under those conditions is if the bristles are damaged, or if you are sick. You can see the study on the CDC website.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love these- ergonomically made and very soft. Very effective cleaning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sustainably Produced + Good Quality = A Consumer Win
reviews.reviewText: I searched for about a week for a sustainably produced toothbrush and after reviewing the landscape of options, this brand stood above the rest and the fact that it's made here sold the deal. After using them a few months, I'm happy to say they've met my expectations.

I like this toothbrush. The angle of the toothbrush allows you to easily brush your back teeth. It is easy to hold but a grippier handle would be helpful. The bristles are just soft enough. My teeth are very sensitive and this toothbrush works very well.
Las cerdas no están muy duras, ni muy suaves. Limpia bien los dientes.

reviews.reviewTitle: Preserve Toothbrushes in Lightweight Pouch, Ultra Soft Bristles, 6-Count
reviews.reviewText: When you have sensitive teeth and can't use the electrical toothbrushes, this is the best I have found over the years, so I definitely approve of this product.

I love these brushes! So happy to be able to get them in bulk. I wanted an eco-friendly toothbrush, but I find the bamboo ones rub the inside of my cheeks and make them sore. These are perfect, with a nice minimal design and multiple colours.
I prefer Preserve brand over all brands
